content: चमूः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [चम्-ऊ <ls>Uṇ. 1. 81</ls>] {@--1@} An army (in general); पश्यैतां पांडुपुत्राणामाचार्य महतीं चमूं <ls>Bg. 1. 3</ls>; वासवीनां चमूनां <ls>Me. 43</ls>; गजवती जवतीव्रहया चमूः <ls>R. 9. 10.</ls> {@--2@} A division of an army consisting of 729 elephants, as many cars, 2187 horse, and 3645 foot. {@--3@} <ab>Ved.</ab> A dish or vessel. {@--4@} A grave.
